response.overview: Four more adventures for Caillou! In Caillou Loves the Fall Caillou and his playschool friends go on a field trip to an apple orchard. In Caillou the Scientist Caillou makes up a new game so everyone will play together. In Caillou the Bookworm Caillou tells a funny story to Jeffrey and Jason about a superhero who can make the rain stop. In Caillou Can Do It Caillou and the twins make finger puppets and put on a puppet show. Episodes: Caillou Loves the Fall, Caillou the Scientist , Caillou the Helper, and Caillou Can Do It
response.title: Caillou: Caillou's Playschool Adventures
